00040 Pixel::Pixel(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, double red, double green, double blue)
00041     :   x_(x), y_(y), red_(red), green_(green), blue_(blue), isForeground_(true), colorspace_(COLORSPACE_RGB)

00060 Pixel::Pixel(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, bool isForeground)
00061     :   x_(x), y_(y), isForeground_(isForeground), colorspace_(COLORSPACE_MONOCHROMATIC)
00062 {
00063     if ( isForeground )
00064     {
00065         grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00066         red_ = 0.0;
00067         green_ = 0.0;
00068         blue_ = 0.0;
00069     }
00070     else
00071     {
00072         grayLevel_ = 1.0;
00073         red_ = 1.0;
00074         green_ = 1.0;
00075         blue_ = 1.0;
00076     }
00077 };

00142 void Pixel::grayLevel (double grayLevel)
00143 {
00144     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_GRAYSCALE )
00145     {
00146         if ( grayLevel < 0.0 )
00147             grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00148         else
00149         {
00150             if ( grayLevel > 1.0 )
00151                 grayLevel = 1.0;
00152             else
00153                 grayLevel_ = grayLevel;
00154         }
00155         
00156         isForeground_ = true;
00157         red_ = 0.0;
00158         green_ = 0.0;
00159         blue_ = 0.0;
00160     }
00161 };

00170 void Pixel::red (double value)
00171 {
00172     if ( value < 0.0 )
00173         red_ = 0.0;
00174     else
00175     {
00176         if ( value > 1.0 )
00177             red_ = 1.0;
00178         else
00179             red_ = value;
00180     }
00181 
00182     // Compute the grayscale equivalent value
00183     grayLevel_ = (0.3 * red_) + (0.59 * green_) + (0.11 * blue_);
00184 };

00279 void Pixel::setColor (double red, double green, double blue)
00280 {
00281     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_RGB )
00282     {
00283         if ( red < 0.0 )
00284             red_ = 0.0;
00285         else
00286         {
00287             if ( red > 1.0 )
00288                 red_ = 1.0;
00289             else
00290                 red_ = red;
00291         }
00292         
00293         if ( green < 0.0 )
00294             green_ = 0.0;
00295         else
00296         {
00297             if ( green > 1.0 )
00298                 green_ = 1.0;
00299             else
00300                 green_ = green;
00301         }
00302         
00303         if ( blue < 0.0 )
00304             blue_ = 0.0;
00305         else
00306         {
00307             if ( blue > 1.0 )
00308                 blue_ = 1.0;
00309             else
00310                 blue_ = blue;
00311         }
00312         
00313         // Set the other representations
00314         grayLevel_ = (0.3 * red_) + (0.59 * green_) + (0.11 * blue_);
00315         isForeground_ = true;
00316     }
00317 };

00346 void Pixel::isForeground (bool isForeground)
00347 {
00348     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_MONOCHROMATIC )
00349     {
00350         isForeground_ = isForeground;
00351         
00352         if ( isForeground_ )
00353         {
00354             grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00355             red_ = 0.0;
00356             green_ = 0.0;
00357             blue_ = 0.0;
00358         }
00359         else
00360         {
00361             grayLevel_ = 1.0;
00362             red_ = 1.0;
00363             green_ = 1.0;
00364             blue_ = 1.0;
00365         }
00366     }
00367         
00368 };
